name: NEON NIGHTMARE
description:
This game is a tribute to the Choose Your Own Adventure book series from the 80s! 

This is a choose your own adventure game with a classic turn based RPG combat system!

You are a college student who wakes up to a Alien Invasion! 

You need to figure out how to survive the invasion! 

You will need to make hard choices to live! 

There are many death endings, but only 1 true final ending to the story! 

Can you survive?

Key Features:

Atmospheric Dark Story

Classic Turn Based RPG System

Digital Choose Your Own Adventure Story 

Many Ways To Die

Retro 2D Pixel Art Style

Retro Style  Soundtrack

Recommended System Requirements

OS Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)

CPU Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor

RAM 512 MB or more
